title: Ep 33: We're Baaack! (Did you miss us?)
itunes:title: Ep 33: We're Baaack!  (Did you miss us?)
description:
In our first episode back from holiday hiatus, we're excited to share the changes we have planned for the pod this year. We're also announcing our first pod guest (who we have a HUGE friend-crush on), and our first book club pick of the year! We're fully rested and ready for a great year of podding. 

Also in this episode: Grace finds out she is on the USPS naughty list,  we're both sharing our favorite and least favorite books of 2018, and our secret for making New Year's resolutions come true (hint: it involves fire!)

Can't get enough Bad On Paper?

Join our FB group for amazing book recs & more

Follow us on Instagram @badonpaperpodcast

Sponsor:

LOLA: for 40% off your FIRST SUBSCRIPTION ORDER, visit mylola.com and enter code BOP at checkout
